resources.string:
AlReaderXPro© 2018–2021,
Odessa, Neverland
Written by Alan http://www.alreader.com alan@alreader.com
Free for Home use

Privacy Policy:
The AlReaderX (AlReaderXPro) applications does not use any private data of the customer. Phone numbers and other personal data are not analyzed by the program, they are not stored and not used.
http://alreader.com/privacyX.html

Special thanks:
MSWord (doc) - Mike Sinkovsky
3D Animation (OpenGL) - Sergei Maksimets
Web Sync and Tops - Konstantin Pogorelov
Graphic design:
Dmitry Petuk
Lenhenster http://ys-3.ru

Donations:
WebMoney WMZ190994095141, WMR225464302949, WMU226972065401
Yandex-Money 41001517788393

AlReaderX Pro© 2018–2021,
Odessa, Neverland
Developed by Alan for MacCentre LLC.

Privacy Policy:
The AlReaderX (AlReaderXPro) applications does not use any private data of the customer. Phone numbers and other personal data are not analyzed by the program, they are not stored and not used.
http://alreader.com/privacyX.html

Special thanks:
MSWord (doc) - Mike Sinkovsky
3D Animation (OpenGL) - Sergei Maksimets
Web Sync and Tops - Konstantin Pogorelov
Graphic design:
Dmitry Petuk
Lenhenster http://ys-3.ru

Donations:
WebMoney WMZ190994095141, WMR225464302949, WMU226972065401
Yandex-Money 41001517788393

" This program uses the fonts:
inglobal (http://www.inglobal.ru)
Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0
http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
Google Material Icons (http://google.github.io/material-design-icons)
Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0
http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
PT Serif (http://www.paratype.ru)
Licensed under the Open Font License.
Philosopher (https://fontstorage.com/ru/foundry/jovanny-lemonad/)
Licensed under the Open Font License.

This program uses the code:
Color Picker https://github.com/QuadFlask/colorpicker
Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the License);
you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
You may obtain a copy of the License at
http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software distributed under the License is distributed on an AS IS BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License.

juniversalchardet is a Java port of 'universalchardet', that is the encoding detector library of Mozilla
https://code.google.com/archive/p/juniversalchardet/
The library is subject to the Mozilla Public License Version 1.1.

UnRAR - https://www.rarlab.com/ (Alexander Roshal), the source code of UnRAR utility is freeware
unrar-android
https://github.com/maoabc/unrar-android
Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the License);
you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
You may obtain a copy of the License at
http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0


AndroidSVG is a SVG parser and renderer for Android.
AndroidSVG is licensed under the Apache License v2.0.
https://bigbadaboom.github.io/androidsvg/index.html

OkHttp is an HTTP client for Android.
OkHttp is licensed under the Apache License v2.0.
https://square.github.io/okhttp/

sardine-android is a WebDAV client for Android.
sardine-android is licensed under the Apache License v2.0.
https://github.com/thegrizzlylabs/sardine-android

CHM lib0.40 is a library for dealing with Microsoft ITSS/CHM format files.
https://github.com/jedwing/CHMLib
This project is licensed using LGPL v2.1

bare-bones-digest, HTTP digest authentication for Android, Copyright (c) 2015, 2016, 2017 Petter Wintzell
https://github.com/al-broco/bare-bones-digest
This project is licensed using The MIT License (MIT)

"
List of books with bookmarks and quotes
Download book from the network library (OPDS)
Open book on internal memory or memory card
File without data. Saving is impossible!
Are you sure you want to delete the bookmark?
Are you sure you want to delete the directory?
Are you sure you want to delete the file? The file can be part of the archive and deletion will result in the loss of all books in the archive
Failed to delete. Maybe there are files in the directory!
Search all books in library catalogs
Are you sure you want to clear Library DataBase?
Do you want to start a new scan? This process can take several minutes, during which the library will be unavailable.
Enter the library address and access parameters
"Basic and Digest authorizations are supported for all OPDS. Only Basic Authorization is supported for HTTP proxies. Unfortunately, Authorization is not supported for SOCKS proxies."
This book has already been downloaded
Are you sure you want to delete this OPDS library?
Download all the books on this page?
Are you sure you want to reload book?
This file type is not supported. Try to open it in another program?
List of books that you have downloaded from all libraries
Try downloading again? An error occurred while loading
Displaying the next page at your request
Displaying the previous page at your request
Delete all bookmarks for this book and the book?
Delete all bookmarks for this book?
Note cut off! Go to footnote to continue reading
Are you sure you want to clear Recent List?
Are you sure you want to remove this from history and delete file?
Are you sure you want to remove all deleted items?
Are you sure you want to remove this from history?
There are no bookmarks in this book.
Dictionary not installed. Please, Install the dictionary you selected.
Dictionary not installed. Please, Install the dictionary you selected.
Error load. Save profile before use it
No connection! Check your network connection
Switch to clock mode for the time input.
Switch to text input mode for the time input.
The book has already been read. Auto scrolling stopped.
Touch screen locked. To unlock, make a long tap with two fingers or press the BACK button.
Sorry, This Feature is not available for this book!
You previously read a book on another device. Do we need to switch to a saved position?
There is no other reading position
To apply the settings, we need to reopen book...
To apply the settings, we need to restart the program. Restart the program after completion...
Are you sure you want to Reset the settings to defaults?
Tap to switch to selecting a day
Tap to switch to selecting a year
Library said: for registered users only
Proxy said: for registered users only
Library said: paid access, no free download
The search for new books is over.
Error start Scan Library Sevice! Most likely, the rights to start the service were taken away from the application.
Common level for day and night
Page size for the list of books
Force refresh if there is a picture on the page
Force refresh after return to app
Click the button you want to override...
The system status bar has a menu color
Sensor error!Sensor error! Most likely your device does not have a motion sensor.
The current threshold value of the motion sensor is %5.02f. Move your device with movements that should reset the sleep timer.
Use HTTPS for all network operations
Anonymous formation of the Top-100 list
Support colors (not recommended! There may be problems in the night mode!)
Use top margin for the first item on the page
Common fonts for day and night
Do not use horizontal swipes for paging
Open links with a long tap
Indent values are set as a percentage
Common margins for day and night
Reduce the brightness of images in night mode
Use real screen pages (slow, not recommended)
Instead of information in the status bar
Save current profile settings as a profile
Long tap for short information about the book
The book has already been read. Text to Speech stopped!
Text to Speech fails to create!
Text to Speech fails to initialize!
(Reading the text will be stopped for a minute!)
